name: Nymar Arisen Demo
description:
Nymar Arisen is a survival/ automation game where you take command of a race of antmen. They can mine for you, build for you, and even fight for you. But beware, for demons will do whatever they can to tear down your buildings, slay your followers and end your protection of this world. You must fight them off before they destroy the world again.

WARNING: The game is still under construction, not all features may be in the demo. There will be more in the future.
